extends hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.GraphicalObject
    Graphical representation of a sphere from which light reflects.

    1.0
    Author:
    Juraj Pejnovic

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sphere

        public Sphere(hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.Point3D center,
              double radius,
              double kdr,
              double kdg,
              double kdb,
              double krr,
              double krg,
              double krb,
              double krn)
        Creates the Sphere with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        center - center of the sphere
        radius - readius of the sphere
        kdr - diffuse coefficient for red
        kdg - diffuse coefficient for green
        kdb - diffuse coefficient for blue
        krr - reflective coefficient for red
        krg - reflective coefficient for green
        krb - reflective coefficient for blue
        krn - reflective power for the color of the object

        Finds the closes intersection of the given Ray with the Sphere.
        Specified by:
        findClosestRayIntersection in class hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.GraphicalObject
        Parameters:
        ray - ray which may intersect with sphere
        Returns:
        returns the intersection data, null if no intersection found
